DOC.brief_summary: We conducted a controlled randomized trial examining the ability of the Mott abdominal Compression Binder to decrease postoperative pain in gynecologic abdominal laparotomy patients
DOC.brief_title: Abdominal Binder Study to Decrease Postoperative Pain
DOC.criteria: gynecologic abdominal laparotomy patients non gynecologic abdominal laparotomy patients
